v-model.description: The key of the currently active tab panel
v-model.description_zh: 当前激活 tab 面板的 key

animated.description: Whether to use animation to toggle tabs, in tabPosition='"top"'| '
animated.default: true, 当 type="card" 时为 false
animated.description_zh: 是否使用动画切换 Tabs，在 tabPosition=`"top"` | `"bottom"` 时有效

defaultActiveKey.description: Initialize the key of the selected panel, if no activeKey is set
defaultActiveKey.description_zh: 初始化选中面板的 key，如果没有设置 activeKey

hideAdd.description: Whether to hide the plus icon, which is valid when 'type="editable-card"'
hideAdd.description_zh: 是否隐藏加号图标，在 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

size.description_zh: 大小，提供 `large` `middle` 和 `small` 三种大小

tabPosition.description: The tabbed position can be 'top', 'right', 'bottom' left
tabPosition.description_zh: 页签位置，可选值有 `top` `right` `bottom` left

type.description: The basic style of the tab, you can choose 'line', 'card', 'editable-card' type
type.description_zh: 页签的基本样式，可选 `line`、`card` `editable-card` 类型

tabBarExtraContent.description: Extra elements on the tab bar
tabBarExtraContent.description_zh: tab bar 上额外的元素

events.name: change
events.description: Toggle the callback of the panel

events.name: edit
events.description: Callbacks for adding and removing tabs are valid when 'type="editable-card"'
events.description_zh: 新增和删除页签的回调，在 `type="editable-card"` 时有效

events.name: tabClick
events.description: The callback on which the tab was clicked

events.name: nextClick
events.description_zh: next 按钮被点击的回调

events.name: prevClick
events.description_zh: prev 按钮被点击的回调
